casebody.data:
No. 10-85. Barry Scheur, Petitioner v. United States, et al. 562 U.S. 1026, 131 S. Ct. 504,

178 L. Ed. 2d 407,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8409. November 1, 2010.

Motion of respondent Robert McMillan for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 600 F.3d 434.
